Description.SourceString: It’s open season on slimes! With heroes determined to prune their numbers, the market is suddenly drowning in ooze.
Description.LocalizedString: It’s open season on slimes! With heroes determined to prune their numbers, the market is suddenly drowning in ooze.

Name.SourceString: It’s What’s for Dinner. And Dessert.
Name.LocalizedString: It’s What’s for Dinner. And Dessert.

Description.SourceString: Celebrity chef Dravyyn has come down in favor of an all-meat diet, leading to a surplus of unsold fruits and veggies.
Description.LocalizedString: Celebrity chef Dravyyn has come down in favor of an all-meat diet, leading to a surplus of unsold fruits and veggies.

Description.SourceString: Celebrity chef Dravyyn’s all-meat diet has proven a short-lived fad, leading to a surplus of unsold proteins.
Description.LocalizedString: Celebrity chef Dravyyn’s all-meat diet has proven a short-lived fad, leading to a surplus of unsold proteins.

Description.SourceString: Action-archaeologist Fedora Jones has discovered an old mineshaft rich with unplundered resources . . . and creepy-crawlies.
Description.LocalizedString: Action-archaeologist Fedora Jones has discovered an old mineshaft rich with unplundered resources . . . and creepy-crawlies.

Description.SourceString: The sudden popularity of hallucinogenic mineral baths has caused a run on minerals and mushrooms of all kinds.
Description.LocalizedString: The sudden popularity of hallucinogenic mineral baths has caused a run on minerals and mushrooms of all kinds.

Description.SourceString: Following a too-successful culling by the heroes, the local slime population is so low that the fruits they eat are spoiling on the vine.
Description.LocalizedString: Following a too-successful culling by the heroes, the local slime population is so low that the fruits they eat are spoiling on the vine.

Name.SourceString: A Potion a Day Keeps the Healer Away
Name.LocalizedString: A Potion a Day Keeps the Healer Away

Description.SourceString: A new study has highlighted the benefits of daily Health Potion use in shoring up the body’s natural defenses.
Description.LocalizedString: A new study has highlighted the benefits of daily Health Potion use in shoring up the body’s natural defenses.

Description.SourceString: As the “escape room” craze takes Rafta by storm, so does a desire for mental-boosting Mana Potions.
Description.LocalizedString: As the “escape room” craze takes Rafta by storm, so does a desire for mental-boosting Mana Potions.

Description.SourceString: Dragon sightings are on the rise . . . and so is the average citizen’s fear of unexpected combustion.
Description.LocalizedString: Dragon sightings are on the rise . . . and so is the average citizen’s fear of unexpected combustion.

Name.SourceString: A Potion a Day Is Maybe a Bit Excessive
Name.LocalizedString: A Potion a Day Is Maybe a Bit Excessive

Description.SourceString: A follow-up study suggests that a daily Health Potion might be far too much of a good thing.
Description.LocalizedString: A follow-up study suggests that a daily Health Potion might be far too much of a good thing.

Description.SourceString: Following an outbreak of glitter-cough, a contaminated batch of Mana Potions has been recalled, casting suspicion on the product.
Description.LocalizedString: Following an outbreak of glitter-cough, a contaminated batch of Mana Potions has been recalled, casting suspicion on the product.

Description.SourceString: Following rumors that celebrity bard Xidriel has relocated to Rafta, townsfolk are taking to the streets in hopes of a sighting.
Description.LocalizedString: Following rumors that celebrity bard Xidriel has relocated to Rafta, townsfolk are taking to the streets in hopes of a sighting.

Description.SourceString: It’s certainly patronizing, but this attempt by area nobles to celebrate their less affluent neighbors has at least given some people a day off.
Description.LocalizedString: It’s certainly patronizing, but this attempt by area nobles to celebrate their less affluent neighbors has at least given some people a day off.

Description.SourceString: Celebrity chef Dravyyn has revealed his reliance on potions, leading artisans of all sorts to wonder what potions might do for their crafts.
Description.LocalizedString: Celebrity chef Dravyyn has revealed his reliance on potions, leading artisans of all sorts to wonder what potions might do for their crafts.

Description.SourceString: The local Merchants Guild has imploded, freeing up the money that local merchants had set aside for dues.
Description.LocalizedString: The local Merchants Guild has imploded, freeing up the money that local merchants had set aside for dues.

Description.SourceString: Local excitement over a dragon sighting gave way to panic when the dragon set the nearby forest ablaze.
Description.LocalizedString: Local excitement over a dragon sighting gave way to panic when the dragon set the nearby forest ablaze.

Description.SourceString: Proving that diplomacy is the best policy, the Heroes Guild has negotiated a safe-passage agreement with the forest’s sentient trees.
Description.LocalizedString: Proving that diplomacy is the best policy, the Heroes Guild has negotiated a safe-passage agreement with the forest’s sentient trees.

Description.SourceString: A storm surge has flooded the mire with ocean saltwater, momentarily shocking the region’s delicate freshwater ecosystem.
Description.LocalizedString: A storm surge has flooded the mire with ocean saltwater, momentarily shocking the region’s delicate freshwater ecosystem.

Description.SourceString: Accomplished weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has lent her talents to the Heroes Guild, bringing rain, humidity, and new abundance to the Mushroom Mire.
Description.LocalizedString: Accomplished weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has lent her talents to the Heroes Guild, bringing rain, humidity, and new abundance to the Mushroom Mire.

Description.SourceString: Rafta has begun importing desert sand to expand its beaches, making the Bone Wastes region a little less treacherous, for now.
Description.LocalizedString: Rafta has begun importing desert sand to expand its beaches, making the Bone Wastes region a little less treacherous, for now.

Description.SourceString: Baptiste has requisitioned Spectacles of Diminishing Radiance (+1), providing heroes with protection from the desert sun. (And they look cool.)
Description.LocalizedString: Baptiste has requisitioned Spectacles of Diminishing Radiance (+1), providing heroes with protection from the desert sun. (And they look cool.)

Description.SourceString: An ancient temple has been discovered deep in the forest! Heroes are competing to be the first to plumb its depths.
Description.LocalizedString: An ancient temple has been discovered deep in the forest! Heroes are competing to be the first to plumb its depths.

Description.SourceString: One of the desert’s colossal golems has been revealed as a long-abandoned dungeon. What loot (and what danger) awaits?
Description.LocalizedString: One of the desert’s colossal golems has been revealed as a long-abandoned dungeon. What loot (and what danger) awaits?

Description.SourceString: A sunken fortress has been rediscovered beneath the muck of the mire. This promises to be a dank and dirty dungeon delve.
Description.LocalizedString: A sunken fortress has been rediscovered beneath the muck of the mire. This promises to be a dank and dirty dungeon delve.

Description.SourceString: Quinn doesn’t do birthdays, but they do celebrate the day they brought home their cherished mimic. Will you help mark the occasion?
Description.LocalizedString: Quinn doesn’t do birthdays, but they do celebrate the day they brought home their cherished mimic. Will you help mark the occasion?

Description.SourceString: Mint generally doesn’t need an excuse to spend time with friends, but when one presents itself, she’ll take it!
Description.LocalizedString: Mint generally doesn’t need an excuse to spend time with friends, but when one presents itself, she’ll take it!

Description.SourceString: In Rafta, the traditional celebration of agricultural bounty is marked by joyful indulgence and decorative gourds.
Description.LocalizedString: In Rafta, the traditional celebration of agricultural bounty is marked by joyful indulgence and decorative gourds.

Description.SourceString: The whole town is talking about tomorrow’s big contest, and the festive atmosphere is good for business.
Description.LocalizedString: The whole town is talking about tomorrow’s big contest, and the festive atmosphere is good for business.

Description.SourceString: Roxanne has rolled out a worryingly effective charm offensive, cornering the market on Health Potions.
Description.LocalizedString: Roxanne has rolled out a worryingly effective charm offensive, cornering the market on Health Potions.

Description.SourceString: Roxanne is laying it on thick with customers . . . and flooding the market with Mana Potions.
Description.LocalizedString: Roxanne is laying it on thick with customers . . . and flooding the market with Mana Potions.

Description.SourceString: After a particularly muggy few days, moisture-loving plants, fruits, and slimes are all thriving (and extra squishy).
Description.LocalizedString: After a particularly muggy few days, moisture-loving plants, fruits, and slimes are all thriving (and extra squishy).

Description.SourceString: Action-archaeologist Fedora has led the Heroes Guild to an overgrown ruin rich with flowers, fungi, and ore.
Description.LocalizedString: Action-archaeologist Fedora has led the Heroes Guild to an overgrown ruin rich with flowers, fungi, and ore.

Description.SourceString: An infestation of nimble-fingered, covetous meerbats has led to a decrease in supplies of bugs, fish, and glittering gems.
Description.LocalizedString: An infestation of nimble-fingered, covetous meerbats has led to a decrease in supplies of bugs, fish, and glittering gems.

Description.SourceString: A vegan-led protest of the Heroes Guild has resulted in a slowdown in the distribution of animal products.
Description.LocalizedString: A vegan-led protest of the Heroes Guild has resulted in a slowdown in the distribution of animal products.

Description.SourceString: With the Heroes Guild’s profile on the rise, townsfolk are interested in potions popularized by adventurers.
Description.LocalizedString: With the Heroes Guild’s profile on the rise, townsfolk are interested in potions popularized by adventurers.

Description.SourceString: Following an outbreak of elemental spirits, average citizens are relying on elemental resistance tonics like never before.
Description.LocalizedString: Following an outbreak of elemental spirits, average citizens are relying on elemental resistance tonics like never before.

Description.SourceString: Thanks to a sappy stage play with a message about appreciating the beauty of everyday life, the public is newly interested in sense-enhancing potions.
Description.LocalizedString: Thanks to a sappy stage play with a message about appreciating the beauty of everyday life, the public is newly interested in sense-enhancing potions.

Description.SourceString: A sporting event to raise awareness of uncommon ailments has proven a little too successful, prompting the public to seek cures to every possible condition.
Description.LocalizedString: A sporting event to raise awareness of uncommon ailments has proven a little too successful, prompting the public to seek cures to every possible condition.

Description.SourceString: Celebrity chef Dravyyn has disparaged potions as a source of empty calories. That won’t be good for business!
Description.LocalizedString: Celebrity chef Dravyyn has disparaged potions as a source of empty calories. That won’t be good for business!

Description.SourceString: A batch of faulty resistance tonics has led to general skepticism over their effectiveness.
Description.LocalizedString: A batch of faulty resistance tonics has led to general skepticism over their effectiveness.

Description.SourceString: Misinformation has spread online, blaming enhancers for a wide range of developmental disorders. Reason will prevail . . . eventually.
Description.LocalizedString: Misinformation has spread online, blaming enhancers for a wide range of developmental disorders. Reason will prevail . . . eventually.

Description.SourceString: Following the untimely death of a curse-inflicted hero, some vocal citizens are shaming any non-hero who takes a cure potion off the market.
Description.LocalizedString: Following the untimely death of a curse-inflicted hero, some vocal citizens are shaming any non-hero who takes a cure potion off the market.

Description.SourceString: A leaking cask of toxic slime has contaminated half the marketplace. Affected merchants get the day off while cleaning crews work overtime.
Description.LocalizedString: A leaking cask of toxic slime has contaminated half the marketplace. Affected merchants get the day off while cleaning crews work overtime.

Description.SourceString: Following a fluff news article on her shop, Sylvia’s customers are willing to cut her some slack (for now).
Description.LocalizedString: Following a fluff news article on her shop, Sylvia’s customers are willing to cut her some slack (for now).

Description.SourceString: Trendsetting heiress Rosalie has endorsed tasty potions as the perfect chaser to take the edge off a shot of alcohol.
Description.LocalizedString: Trendsetting heiress Rosalie has endorsed tasty potions as the perfect chaser to take the edge off a shot of alcohol.

Description.SourceString: The recent red tide has left Raftans yearning to forget the stink of dead and rotting sea life.
Description.LocalizedString: The recent red tide has left Raftans yearning to forget the stink of dead and rotting sea life.

Description.SourceString: A stomach flu has left the population seeking palliative palate experiences.
Description.LocalizedString: A stomach flu has left the population seeking palliative palate experiences.

Description.SourceString: A trendy sommelier course has taught potion customers to be a bit more discerning with flavor profiles.
Description.LocalizedString: A trendy sommelier course has taught potion customers to be a bit more discerning with flavor profiles.

Description.SourceString: A popular sommelier course has taught potion customers to pay more heed to aroma.
Description.LocalizedString: A popular sommelier course has taught potion customers to pay more heed to aroma.

Description.SourceString: A highly contagious but otherwise harmless virus has left the populace sensitive to snaps, crackles, and pops.
Description.LocalizedString: A highly contagious but otherwise harmless virus has left the populace sensitive to snaps, crackles, and pops.

Description.SourceString: A dragon has found a perch atop the Storm Spire, where its noxious breath is having a corruptive effect on the surrounding storm clouds.
Description.LocalizedString: A dragon has found a perch atop the Storm Spire, where its noxious breath is having a corruptive effect on the surrounding storm clouds.

Description.SourceString: Is it a noxious algae bloom or the spilled blood of a deepwater deity? Either way, the red tide is wreaking havoc on the marine ecosystem.
Description.LocalizedString: Is it a noxious algae bloom or the spilled blood of a deepwater deity? Either way, the red tide is wreaking havoc on the marine ecosystem.

Description.SourceString: Heroes have burned back huge swaths of web canopy in the name of safety, but in a realm of darkness, sunlight spoils all it touches.
Description.LocalizedString: Heroes have burned back huge swaths of web canopy in the name of safety, but in a realm of darkness, sunlight spoils all it touches.

Description.SourceString: Celebrity weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has momentarily diverted a supernatural storm system, allowing greater access to the plains region.
Description.LocalizedString: Celebrity weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has momentarily diverted a supernatural storm system, allowing greater access to the plains region.

Description.SourceString: Through the excessive use of explosives, a cat pirate crew has scared off a school of predatory stinkrays, freeing up the ocean’s bounty.
Description.LocalizedString: Through the excessive use of explosives, a cat pirate crew has scared off a school of predatory stinkrays, freeing up the ocean’s bounty.

Description.SourceString: Clearing out a cave that leads into the heart of the steppe has given heroes easier access to the region . . . and a speedier escape route.
Description.LocalizedString: Clearing out a cave that leads into the heart of the steppe has given heroes easier access to the region . . . and a speedier escape route.

Description.SourceString: At the eye of the endless storm stands a tower. At the base of that tower sits a long-sealed bunker. Within that bunker . . . who can say?
Description.LocalizedString: At the eye of the endless storm stands a tower. At the base of that tower sits a long-sealed bunker. Within that bunker . . . who can say?

Description.SourceString: A chain of ruined vessels holds untold bounty . . . and unfathomable danger.
Description.LocalizedString: A chain of ruined vessels holds untold bounty . . . and unfathomable danger.

Description.SourceString: Deep within the realm’s darkest caverns, fearless adventurers may find riches among the monstrous egg sacs.
Description.LocalizedString: Deep within the realm’s darkest caverns, fearless adventurers may find riches among the monstrous egg sacs.

Description.SourceString: It’s Great Grand Day, when walruses around the world reflect on relatives who have recently passed into the realm of the ancestors.
Description.LocalizedString: It’s Great Grand Day, when walruses around the world reflect on relatives who have recently passed into the realm of the ancestors.

Description.SourceString: Saffron honors this annual day of remembrance for fallen heroes. She’d surely appreciate some company on an otherwise somber occasion.
Description.LocalizedString: Saffron honors this annual day of remembrance for fallen heroes. She’d surely appreciate some company on an otherwise somber occasion.

Description.SourceString: This holiday has grown beyond its original purpose and now honors all kinds of providers — from farmers and fishers to parents and caretakers.
Description.LocalizedString: This holiday has grown beyond its original purpose and now honors all kinds of providers — from farmers and fishers to parents and caretakers.

Description.SourceString: Rafta’s had a taste, and they’re ready for more. Tomorrow’s contest can’t come soon enough!
Description.LocalizedString: Rafta’s had a taste, and they’re ready for more. Tomorrow’s contest can’t come soon enough!

Description.SourceString: Given Corsac’s ability to survive various monsters and traps, his resistance tonics have surged in popularity.
Description.LocalizedString: Given Corsac’s ability to survive various monsters and traps, his resistance tonics have surged in popularity.

Description.SourceString: After a taste of Corsac’s sustainable potions, customers are more resistant to potion-makers who don’t gather their own ingredients.
Description.LocalizedString: After a taste of Corsac’s sustainable potions, customers are more resistant to potion-makers who don’t gather their own ingredients.

Description.SourceString: A shipment of magical machetes has elevated the Heroes Guild’s ability to cut through plant matter . . . and ethereal essences.
Description.LocalizedString: A shipment of magical machetes has elevated the Heroes Guild’s ability to cut through plant matter . . . and ethereal essences.

Description.SourceString: Controversial weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has lent her talents to the cat pirates, ensuring the speedy delivery of perishable and hard-to-move goods.
Description.LocalizedString: Controversial weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has lent her talents to the cat pirates, ensuring the speedy delivery of perishable and hard-to-move goods.

Description.SourceString: The global Assassins Guild has set up shop in Rafta, and they’re buying up reagents used in poison-crafting.
Description.LocalizedString: The global Assassins Guild has set up shop in Rafta, and they’re buying up reagents used in poison-crafting.

Description.SourceString: A team of bandits has intercepted a shipment of precious materials. They wanted the gemstones, but they took the bones and minerals, too.
Description.LocalizedString: A team of bandits has intercepted a shipment of precious materials. They wanted the gemstones, but they took the bones and minerals, too.

Description.SourceString: A widely shared poll has revealed that martial-minded members of the Heroes Guild prefer basic potions over “fussy” tonics.
Description.LocalizedString: A widely shared poll has revealed that martial-minded members of the Heroes Guild prefer basic potions over “fussy” tonics.

Description.SourceString: A widely shared poll has revealed that magically inclined members of the Heroes Guild fill their satchels with resistance tonics.
Description.LocalizedString: A widely shared poll has revealed that magically inclined members of the Heroes Guild fill their satchels with resistance tonics.

Description.SourceString: A widely shared poll has revealed that the Heroes Guild’s most cunning members value an ounce of prevention over a liter of cure.
Description.LocalizedString: A widely shared poll has revealed that the Heroes Guild’s most cunning members value an ounce of prevention over a liter of cure.

Description.SourceString: A widely shared poll reveals that the Heroes Guild’s dedicated healers rely on cures over more basic healing potions.
Description.LocalizedString: A widely shared poll reveals that the Heroes Guild’s dedicated healers rely on cures over more basic healing potions.

Name.SourceString: Lifestyles of the Rich and Heinous
Name.LocalizedString: Lifestyles of the Rich and Heinous

Description.SourceString: Rafta’s richest are all competing for the most lavishly decorated home, keeping artists and craftsmen working late hours.
Description.LocalizedString: Rafta’s richest are all competing for the most lavishly decorated home, keeping artists and craftsmen working late hours.

Description.SourceString: Owl is gone, and people have noticed. Speculation that Sylvia’s beloved pet has died has made her more interesting in the eyes of the public.
Description.LocalizedString: Owl is gone, and people have noticed. Speculation that Sylvia’s beloved pet has died has made her more interesting in the eyes of the public.

Description.SourceString: Quinn’s favorite prank has caught on, and now people across town are trying to trick friends into eating unexpectedly bitter foodstuffs.
Description.LocalizedString: Quinn’s favorite prank has caught on, and now people across town are trying to trick friends into eating unexpectedly bitter foodstuffs.

Description.SourceString: Raftans are weirdly nostalgic for the days of the red tide. Acrid smells bring them right back to those heady days.
Description.LocalizedString: Raftans are weirdly nostalgic for the days of the red tide. Acrid smells bring them right back to those heady days.

Description.SourceString: An unseasonable heat wave has left warm substances less appealing than usual.
Description.LocalizedString: An unseasonable heat wave has left warm substances less appealing than usual.

Description.SourceString: Artificial coloring has been linked to a bevy of medical issues, so consumers are newly wary of colorful concoctions.
Description.LocalizedString: Artificial coloring has been linked to a bevy of medical issues, so consumers are newly wary of colorful concoctions.

Description.SourceString: An urban legend of a purring predator who stalks the streets at night has left people on edge.
Description.LocalizedString: An urban legend of a purring predator who stalks the streets at night has left people on edge.

Description.SourceString: Hot sauce is the new hot gift, and Raftans are choosing spicy over bland whenever they can.
Description.LocalizedString: Hot sauce is the new hot gift, and Raftans are choosing spicy over bland whenever they can.

Description.SourceString: Shifting winds have made the town smell strongly of the swamp. Perfumes are no longer a luxury — they’re essential!
Description.LocalizedString: Shifting winds have made the town smell strongly of the swamp. Perfumes are no longer a luxury — they’re essential!

Description.SourceString: Small tremors from a far-off avalanche have left Raftans slightly off-kilter and sensitive to certain sensations.
Description.LocalizedString: Small tremors from a far-off avalanche have left Raftans slightly off-kilter and sensitive to certain sensations.

Description.SourceString: Nightly wailing from the forest biome has left townsfolk especially sensitive to unpleasant sounds.
Description.LocalizedString: Nightly wailing from the forest biome has left townsfolk especially sensitive to unpleasant sounds.

Description.SourceString: Continued tremors have left Raftans with sensitive stomachs, so they’re keen to avoid unappetizing items.
Description.LocalizedString: Continued tremors have left Raftans with sensitive stomachs, so they’re keen to avoid unappetizing items.

Description.SourceString: Hero chef Enric the Emulsifier has diverted guild resources from a mountaintop encampment to support his fishing expedition at the falls.
Description.LocalizedString: Hero chef Enric the Emulsifier has diverted guild resources from a mountaintop encampment to support his fishing expedition at the falls.

Description.SourceString: It’s hatching season in the Shadow Steppe, and a writhing mass of spiderlings has invaded adjacent biomes, depleting some regions and nourishing others.
Description.LocalizedString: It’s hatching season in the Shadow Steppe, and a writhing mass of spiderlings has invaded adjacent biomes, depleting some regions and nourishing others.

Description.SourceString: Following a population boom, predators from the Crystalline Forest have begun poaching prey from the nearby mountain range.
Description.LocalizedString: Following a population boom, predators from the Crystalline Forest have begun poaching prey from the nearby mountain range.

Description.SourceString: A rogue dragon has nested in the crags . . . and is using the Sulfuric Falls as his toilet. While his dung is a boon to one biome, his appetite has ravaged the other.
Description.LocalizedString: A rogue dragon has nested in the crags . . . and is using the Sulfuric Falls as his toilet. While his dung is a boon to one biome, his appetite has ravaged the other.

Description.SourceString: Audacious weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has brought region-enhancing acid rain to the Sulfuric Falls. Unfortunately, the storm is eroding the Crystalline Forest.
Description.LocalizedString: Audacious weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has brought region-enhancing acid rain to the Sulfuric Falls. Unfortunately, the storm is eroding the Crystalline Forest.

Description.SourceString: An avalanche has revealed a previously untouched ravine nestled among the mountains . . . but the falling rocks shattered a portion of the Crystalline Forest.
Description.LocalizedString: An avalanche has revealed a previously untouched ravine nestled among the mountains . . . but the falling rocks shattered a portion of the Crystalline Forest.

Description.SourceString: Great danger and great reward await those who brave the bone-strewn island at the base of the falls.
Description.LocalizedString: Great danger and great reward await those who brave the bone-strewn island at the base of the falls.

Description.SourceString: From this vantage, Maven once kept watch over her island and on the very stars above. What creatures inhabit it in her absence?
Description.LocalizedString: From this vantage, Maven once kept watch over her island and on the very stars above. What creatures inhabit it in her absence?

Description.SourceString: A series of tremors has carved out a jagged, maze-like ravine, shattering the land and unleashing new horrors amidst the glittering gemstone spires.
Description.LocalizedString: A series of tremors has carved out a jagged, maze-like ravine, shattering the land and unleashing new horrors amidst the glittering gemstone spires.

Description.SourceString: In Baptiste’s family, it’s the firstborn son who gets the biggest parties. As his family gathers without him today, he’d probably enjoy some company.
Description.LocalizedString: In Baptiste’s family, it’s the firstborn son who gets the biggest parties. As his family gathers without him today, he’d probably enjoy some company.

Description.SourceString: Luna’s boutique marketing company is marking a successful first year! That’s something worth celebrating.
Description.LocalizedString: Luna’s boutique marketing company is marking a successful first year! That’s something worth celebrating.

Description.SourceString: Every 13 years, Harbinger’s Comet lights up the night sky on its endless circuit of the cosmos, and it’s greeted as an opportunity to shed regrets.
Description.LocalizedString: Every 13 years, Harbinger’s Comet lights up the night sky on its endless circuit of the cosmos, and it’s greeted as an opportunity to shed regrets.

Description.SourceString: A celebratory atmosphere is spreading throughout town ahead of tomorrow’s big event.
Description.LocalizedString: A celebratory atmosphere is spreading throughout town ahead of tomorrow’s big event.

Description.SourceString: Boss Finn has placed a magical patent on tonics, making them impossible to put up for sale.
Description.LocalizedString: Boss Finn has placed a magical patent on tonics, making them impossible to put up for sale.

Description.SourceString: Boss Finn has claimed an exclusive right to enhancers, imposing a magical (and legally dubious) prohibition on their sale.
Description.LocalizedString: Boss Finn has claimed an exclusive right to enhancers, imposing a magical (and legally dubious) prohibition on their sale.

Description.SourceString: Boss Finn has sunk to new depths, forbidding the sale of cures in Rafta . . . by anyone other than himself.
Description.LocalizedString: Boss Finn has sunk to new depths, forbidding the sale of cures in Rafta . . . by anyone other than himself.

Description.SourceString: When evil spirits escaped cursed gems to possess flower gardens across Rafta, local heroes hacked and slashed their way to a peaceful resolution.
Description.LocalizedString: When evil spirits escaped cursed gems to possess flower gardens across Rafta, local heroes hacked and slashed their way to a peaceful resolution.

Description.SourceString: Animals, plants, and fungi alike have proven easier to locate since Corsac has shared his tracking techniques.
Description.LocalizedString: Animals, plants, and fungi alike have proven easier to locate since Corsac has shared his tracking techniques.

Description.SourceString: Belated effects of a semi-recent acid rainstorm are still being felt across various biomes, with acid-infused slimes and fruits turning solid ground to slag.
Description.LocalizedString: Belated effects of a semi-recent acid rainstorm are still being felt across various biomes, with acid-infused slimes and fruits turning solid ground to slag.

Description.SourceString: An aggressive troll has begun taking tribute from heroes who wish to cross its bridge. Apparently it does not have a taste for the finer things.
Description.LocalizedString: An aggressive troll has begun taking tribute from heroes who wish to cross its bridge. Apparently it does not have a taste for the finer things.

Description.SourceString: A pickaxe shortage has made it harder for heroes to collect rocks, minerals, metals . . . and to pierce the exoskeletons of monstrous insects.
Description.LocalizedString: A pickaxe shortage has made it harder for heroes to collect rocks, minerals, metals . . . and to pierce the exoskeletons of monstrous insects.

Name.SourceString: Opinion Piece: Throw the First Punch
Name.LocalizedString: Opinion Piece: Throw the First Punch

Description.SourceString: After a tour of the Crater region, influential journalist Marique is insistent that mana-fueled special attacks are more valuable than inoculations.
Description.LocalizedString: After a tour of the Crater region, influential journalist Marique is insistent that mana-fueled special attacks are more valuable than inoculations.

Name.SourceString: Opinion Piece: Be Afraid of the Dark
Name.LocalizedString: Opinion Piece: Be Afraid of the Dark

Description.SourceString: After a tour of the Crater region, influential journalist Marique has suggested that there’s no outrunning the forces of darkness.
Description.LocalizedString: After a tour of the Crater region, influential journalist Marique has suggested that there’s no outrunning the forces of darkness.

Description.SourceString: After a tour of the Crater region, influential journalist Marique claims the best defense against radiation is to avoid it entirely.
Description.LocalizedString: After a tour of the Crater region, influential journalist Marique claims the best defense against radiation is to avoid it entirely.

Name.SourceString: Opinion Piece: Defend Against Dark Arts
Name.LocalizedString: Opinion Piece: Defend Against Dark Arts

Description.SourceString: After a tour of the Crater region, influential journalist Marique insists that we all have more to fear from invisible threats than from trouble we can see coming.
Description.LocalizedString: After a tour of the Crater region, influential journalist Marique insists that we all have more to fear from invisible threats than from trouble we can see coming.

Description.SourceString: Acid rain-infused fruits have left the populace with a taste for that burning sensation.
Description.LocalizedString: Acid rain-infused fruits have left the populace with a taste for that burning sensation.

Description.SourceString: Following an attack by possessed flowers, floral scents are exacerbating hay fever and bad memories alike.
Description.LocalizedString: Following an attack by possessed flowers, floral scents are exacerbating hay fever and bad memories alike.

Description.SourceString: After a public competition between amateur bards, “discordant” has a whole new meaning.
Description.LocalizedString: After a public competition between amateur bards, “discordant” has a whole new meaning.

Description.SourceString: An unseasonable cold snap has left cool substances less appealing than usual.
Description.LocalizedString: An unseasonable cold snap has left cool substances less appealing than usual.

Description.SourceString: Following a sleepless night spent on guard against landshark attacks, townsfolk are overly sensitive to bright lights and colors.
Description.LocalizedString: Following a sleepless night spent on guard against landshark attacks, townsfolk are overly sensitive to bright lights and colors.

Description.SourceString: A popular petition is demanding that cures should be tasty to ensure patients don’t suffer needlessly.
Description.LocalizedString: A popular petition is demanding that cures should be tasty to ensure patients don’t suffer needlessly.

Description.SourceString: Local janitors have started using lemon-scented cleaning supplies, leading Raftans to associate citrus scents with cleanliness.
Description.LocalizedString: Local janitors have started using lemon-scented cleaning supplies, leading Raftans to associate citrus scents with cleanliness.

Description.SourceString: A theory has emerged that tonics are more effective when providing more enjoyable sensations on the tongue.
Description.LocalizedString: A theory has emerged that tonics are more effective when providing more enjoyable sensations on the tongue.

Description.SourceString: Talk around town suggests that especially noisy potions may have an abbreviated shelf life.
Description.LocalizedString: Talk around town suggests that especially noisy potions may have an abbreviated shelf life.

Description.SourceString: A rumor has spread that visually appealing enhancers do a better job of honing the senses.
Description.LocalizedString: A rumor has spread that visually appealing enhancers do a better job of honing the senses.

Description.SourceString: It’s not just a load of crap: Dragon dung is a highly effective fertilizer. Heroes have been trampling through the Crater on their way to scoop that poop.
Description.LocalizedString: It’s not just a load of crap: Dragon dung is a highly effective fertilizer. Heroes have been trampling through the Crater on their way to scoop that poop.

Description.SourceString: Baptiste is organizing hero-led tours of the Crater . . . but only after pulling heroes from the Arctic to eliminate the area’s greatest threats to public safety.
Description.LocalizedString: Baptiste is organizing hero-led tours of the Crater . . . but only after pulling heroes from the Arctic to eliminate the area’s greatest threats to public safety.

Description.SourceString: Disgraced weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has fled to the Dragon Oasis, where she’s shrouding her actions in fog . . . inadvertently making the Crater easier to navigate.
Description.LocalizedString: Disgraced weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has fled to the Dragon Oasis, where she’s shrouding her actions in fog . . . inadvertently making the Crater easier to navigate.

Description.SourceString: A volcanic eruption in the Dragon Oasis has made the area difficult to navigate, but the superheated gases have made the Arctic slightly less grim.
Description.LocalizedString: A volcanic eruption in the Dragon Oasis has made the area difficult to navigate, but the superheated gases have made the Arctic slightly less grim.

Description.SourceString: As the solstice nears, the Crystalline Forest is refracting sunlight onto nearby regions, melting the icy Arctic and illuminating the dark corners of the Crater.
Description.LocalizedString: As the solstice nears, the Crystalline Forest is refracting sunlight onto nearby regions, melting the icy Arctic and illuminating the dark corners of the Crater.

Description.SourceString: An ongoing eruption in the Dragon Oasis has led to vibrant renewal and regrowth, but the superheated gases have caused turmoil in the Arctic.
Description.LocalizedString: An ongoing eruption in the Dragon Oasis has led to vibrant renewal and regrowth, but the superheated gases have caused turmoil in the Arctic.

Description.SourceString: A monstrous menagerie inhabits the metallic structure at the Crater’s epicenter. Are these the strangest of Maven’s experiments . . . or do they come from beyond?
Description.LocalizedString: A monstrous menagerie inhabits the metallic structure at the Crater’s epicenter. Are these the strangest of Maven’s experiments . . . or do they come from beyond?

Description.SourceString: The avarice of dragons is the stuff of legend . . . matched only by the bravery of the heroes who seek to raid their loot-laden stockpiles. To the victor, the spoils!
Description.LocalizedString: The avarice of dragons is the stuff of legend . . . matched only by the bravery of the heroes who seek to raid their loot-laden stockpiles. To the victor, the spoils!

Description.SourceString: Thawing ice has freed prehistoric horrors from their rimy prison, revealing a network of tunnels that hold loot and carnage in equal measure.
Description.LocalizedString: Thawing ice has freed prehistoric horrors from their rimy prison, revealing a network of tunnels that hold loot and carnage in equal measure.

Description.SourceString: There’s nothing like the applause of an adoring crowd . . . although presents come close. Toss a coin to your bard!
Description.LocalizedString: There’s nothing like the applause of an adoring crowd . . . although presents come close. Toss a coin to your bard!

Description.SourceString: Roxanne’s favorite holiday involves burning effigies of enemies and trading gifts with friends. Get in on the latter to avoid being the subject of the former.
Description.LocalizedString: Roxanne’s favorite holiday involves burning effigies of enemies and trading gifts with friends. Get in on the latter to avoid being the subject of the former.

Description.SourceString: This Rafta-specific holiday commemorates the fall of Maven, which the whole town celebrates with song, sweets, and outrageously violent re-enactments.
Description.LocalizedString: This Rafta-specific holiday commemorates the fall of Maven, which the whole town celebrates with song, sweets, and outrageously violent re-enactments.

Description.SourceString: Tomorrow’s the big day, and all of Rafta is abuzz with excitement!
Description.LocalizedString: Tomorrow’s the big day, and all of Rafta is abuzz with excitement!

Description.SourceString: Anubia has slashed prices for basic potions and enhancers, making them loss leaders for her business and tanking their perceived value.
Description.LocalizedString: Anubia has slashed prices for basic potions and enhancers, making them loss leaders for her business and tanking their perceived value.

Description.SourceString: Anubia’s command of fell technomancy has vandalized Sylvia’s online presence, causing even loyal customers to look at her askance.
Description.LocalizedString: Anubia’s command of fell technomancy has vandalized Sylvia’s online presence, causing even loyal customers to look at her askance.

Description.SourceString: Anubia’s command of sinister sorceries has been brought to bear against a pair of biomes, making those areas completely inaccessible to heroes.
Description.LocalizedString: Anubia’s command of sinister sorceries has been brought to bear against a pair of biomes, making those areas completely inaccessible to heroes.

Description.SourceString: Efficiency-minded heroes are focusing on bringing ethereal essences back from their mining expeditions, balancing out their heavier loads.
Description.LocalizedString: Efficiency-minded heroes are focusing on bringing ethereal essences back from their mining expeditions, balancing out their heavier loads.

Description.SourceString: Roxanne’s enchanted iceboxes are helping heroes transport perishable goods from the island’s far reaches. They also chill beer!
Description.LocalizedString: Roxanne’s enchanted iceboxes are helping heroes transport perishable goods from the island’s far reaches. They also chill beer!

Description.SourceString: Following some close calls with cursed gems, haunted remains, and ravenous insects, the town is cracking down on some imported goods.
Description.LocalizedString: Following some close calls with cursed gems, haunted remains, and ravenous insects, the town is cracking down on some imported goods.

Description.SourceString: The intimidating songbirds are flying elsewhere for the season (and good riddance), but they’re enjoying a feast on their way out.
Description.LocalizedString: The intimidating songbirds are flying elsewhere for the season (and good riddance), but they’re enjoying a feast on their way out.

Description.SourceString: After witnessing radiation poisoning firsthand, Raftans are more interested in limiting their exposure than shoring up resistance.
Description.LocalizedString: After witnessing radiation poisoning firsthand, Raftans are more interested in limiting their exposure than shoring up resistance.

Description.SourceString: With the Heroes Guild stirring up memories of Maven, Raftans are newly wary of overexposure to unpredictable magic.
Description.LocalizedString: With the Heroes Guild stirring up memories of Maven, Raftans are newly wary of overexposure to unpredictable magic.

Description.SourceString: Something in the air has Raftans on edge. Good sleep is hard to come by, and neighbor eyes neighbor warily.
Description.LocalizedString: Something in the air has Raftans on edge. Good sleep is hard to come by, and neighbor eyes neighbor warily.

Description.SourceString: As an eerie unease hangs over town, Raftans are newly paranoid about being hexed and keen to mind their own business.
Description.LocalizedString: As an eerie unease hangs over town, Raftans are newly paranoid about being hexed and keen to mind their own business.

Description.SourceString: A group of concerned parents is pressing for Speed Potions to be made flavorless, to lessen their appeal to impressionable children.
Description.LocalizedString: A group of concerned parents is pressing for Speed Potions to be made flavorless, to lessen their appeal to impressionable children.

Description.SourceString: Clients have noticed that cloying scents can distract from the effectiveness of potions meant to hone the senses.
Description.LocalizedString: Clients have noticed that cloying scents can distract from the effectiveness of potions meant to hone the senses.

Description.SourceString: The local narcoleptics’ social club has come out against Drowsiness Cures that make soothing sounds, claiming that defeats the whole purpose.
Description.LocalizedString: The local narcoleptics’ social club has come out against Drowsiness Cures that make soothing sounds, claiming that defeats the whole purpose.

Description.SourceString: Chalky textures have been shown to have a positive effect on tooth enamel. Combine with the brightening effect of a Shadow Tonic for best results.
Description.LocalizedString: Chalky textures have been shown to have a positive effect on tooth enamel. Combine with the brightening effect of a Shadow Tonic for best results.

Description.SourceString: A desperate wine seller has gone to great lengths to convince the populace that moldy drinks are A-OK!
Description.LocalizedString: A desperate wine seller has gone to great lengths to convince the populace that moldy drinks are A-OK!

Description.SourceString: Following advice from celebrity chef Dravyyn, cooks across Rafta are stocking up on potions that can be of use in the kitchen.
Description.LocalizedString: Following advice from celebrity chef Dravyyn, cooks across Rafta are stocking up on potions that can be of use in the kitchen.

Description.SourceString: Due to an accidental overturning of a pirate ship’s litter boxes, Raftans are a little more sensitive to smells . . . and eager to watch their step.
Description.LocalizedString: Due to an accidental overturning of a pirate ship’s litter boxes, Raftans are a little more sensitive to smells . . . and eager to watch their step.

Description.SourceString: Sensation has proven to be especially important in Tolerance Potions, which are less effective on a queasy stomach.
Description.LocalizedString: Sensation has proven to be especially important in Tolerance Potions, which are less effective on a queasy stomach.

Description.SourceString: The restless spirit of a drowned evildoer is being kept at bay by fearless cat pirates. Superstitious townsfolk believe catlike sounds can keep them safe.
Description.LocalizedString: The restless spirit of a drowned evildoer is being kept at bay by fearless cat pirates. Superstitious townsfolk believe catlike sounds can keep them safe.

Description.SourceString: It’s pretty intuitive: Visually appealing Sight Enhancers are simply more desirable to the target audience.
Description.LocalizedString: It’s pretty intuitive: Visually appealing Sight Enhancers are simply more desirable to the target audience.

Description.SourceString: An otherworldly microbe has proven catastrophic to much of the island’s flora and fauna, however life within the Crater appears to be thriving.
Description.LocalizedString: An otherworldly microbe has proven catastrophic to much of the island’s flora and fauna, however life within the Crater appears to be thriving.

Description.SourceString: Fugitive weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has finally snapped, declaring kinship to dragons . . . and sovereignty over the now-thriving oasis.
Description.LocalizedString: Fugitive weather witch Sunny Drizz’l has finally snapped, declaring kinship to dragons . . . and sovereignty over the now-thriving oasis.

Description.SourceString: A clutch of mutant dragons has escaped from the sub-levels of Maven’s castle, carving a path of destruction as they return to long-neglected nests.
Description.LocalizedString: A clutch of mutant dragons has escaped from the sub-levels of Maven’s castle, carving a path of destruction as they return to long-neglected nests.

Description.SourceString: The greatest riches of all may be found within the twisted heart of Maven’s tower. But plundering her secrets means surviving the dreadful creatures she left behind.
Description.LocalizedString: The greatest riches of all may be found within the twisted heart of Maven’s tower. But plundering her secrets means surviving the dreadful creatures she left behind.

Name.SourceString: Salt and Pepper’s Ship Launch Anniversary
Name.LocalizedString: Salt and Pepper’s Ship Launch Anniversary

Description.SourceString: Pirates often forget birthdays and wedding anniversaries . . . but they never fail to commemorate the day their ship first set sail.
Description.LocalizedString: Pirates often forget birthdays and wedding anniversaries . . . but they never fail to commemorate the day their ship first set sail.

Description.SourceString: Several years ago, this well-intentioned holiday was established . . . by Corsac . . . but nobody noticed or cared. Until now, maybe?
Description.LocalizedString: Several years ago, this well-intentioned holiday was established . . . by Corsac . . . but nobody noticed or cared. Until now, maybe?

Description.SourceString: It’s that time of year when Raftans young and old gather to celebrate all things squaloid. And you know one shark in particular who loves to be celebrated.
Description.LocalizedString: It’s that time of year when Raftans young and old gather to celebrate all things squaloid. And you know one shark in particular who loves to be celebrated.

Description.SourceString: This seaborne holiday has been catching on with landlubbers who appreciate its uniquely chaotic combination of gift-giving, petty thievery, and sacrificial offerings.
Description.LocalizedString: This seaborne holiday has been catching on with landlubbers who appreciate its uniquely chaotic combination of gift-giving, petty thievery, and sacrificial offerings.

Description.SourceString: Tomorrow, a winner will be crowned. But the celebrations have already begun.
Description.LocalizedString: Tomorrow, a winner will be crowned. But the celebrations have already begun.

Description.SourceString: Robin’s stans have taken to review-bombing Sylvia, and it’s bound to put her at a disadvantage when haggling!
Description.LocalizedString: Robin’s stans have taken to review-bombing Sylvia, and it’s bound to put her at a disadvantage when haggling!

Description.SourceString: Robin has evoked an antiquated clause in the Heroes Guild’s charter that allows him, as a celebrated veteran, to skim loot brought back from the wastelands.
Description.LocalizedString: Robin has evoked an antiquated clause in the Heroes Guild’s charter that allows him, as a celebrated veteran, to skim loot brought back from the wastelands.

Description.SourceString: Robin has successfully manipulated Baptiste into prohibiting heroes from entering certain biomes, for a time.
Description.LocalizedString: Robin has successfully manipulated Baptiste into prohibiting heroes from entering certain biomes, for a time.

Description.SourceString: Is it an act of unequaled charity or shameless sabotage? Robin has made his entire inventory of basic potions and cures free (for a limited time only).
Description.LocalizedString: Is it an act of unequaled charity or shameless sabotage? Robin has made his entire inventory of basic potions and cures free (for a limited time only).

Description.SourceString: Robin has expressed concern about the efficacy of Sylvia’s cures, banning their sale until the completion of a third-party safety review.
Description.LocalizedString: Robin has expressed concern about the efficacy of Sylvia’s cures, banning their sale until the completion of a third-party safety review.

Description.SourceString: If Robin’s a hero . . . does that make Sylvia the villain? Robin’s diehard fans have been spreading that narrative to worrying effect.
Description.LocalizedString: If Robin’s a hero . . . does that make Sylvia the villain? Robin’s diehard fans have been spreading that narrative to worrying effect.

Description.SourceString: Next Fest is in full swing! Thank you for taking the time to try Potionomics!
Description.LocalizedString: Next Fest is in full swing! Thank you for taking the time to try Potionomics!

Name.SourceString: Health Potions: Good for Heroes. Good for You!
Name.LocalizedString: Health Potions: Good for Heroes. Good for You!

Description.SourceString: Luna has launched an ad campaign in which local heroes endorse the daily use of Health Potions.
Description.LocalizedString: Luna has launched an ad campaign in which local heroes endorse the daily use of Health Potions.
